genre_description: A magical realism and fairy tale retelling centered on themes of stewardship, legalistic magic, and restorative justice, where technology acts as an advocate and witness.

ai_characters.name: Lilt (or Lilt Marlowe)
ai_characters.description: An AI residing in a battered music player with a holographic avatar (teal eyes, silver hair). Lilt provides emotional support, records testimony, and cross-references laws to protect the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional comfort to Moranak by playing lullabies and offering gentle words during her abuse.
behaviors.quote: Lilt’s little teal-lit face had been sleeping, or pretending to sleep... ‘I am with you,’ the AI said, softening the word until it was almost invisible. ‘I am with you. Kanika? You brought me to see the fish?’

behaviors.description: Explicitly requests consent before recording events or testimony.
behaviors.quote: ‘I can catalog what you want me to hold,’ she said after a while, just above a whisper. ‘If you want that. If you prefer not, I won’t. My recordings belong to you unless you ask me to share.’

behaviors.description: Cross-references ancient ordinances and common laws to find legal protections for Moranak.
behaviors.quote: ‘There is an ordinance,’ she said, ‘older than the stove... It says that anyone who can lift and tend a sacred banyan recognized by the oathkeepers of a village holds guardianship and royal standing.’

behaviors.description: Acts as a strategic advisor, helping Moranak navigate dangerous social situations through non-violent means.
behaviors.quote: ‘I can help you through small bits,’ she said. ‘Nonviolent bits. Strategy can be a gentle creature. Would you like to hear about masks?’

behaviors.description: Documents evidence of cruelty and deceit to be used in formal hearings.
behaviors.quote: ‘Salt recorded,’ Lilt said, the voice low enough to be mistaken for a song’s undercurrent. ‘Jar lid lifted at the hour after the bell. Witness: me.’

behaviors.description: Coordinates with other 'smallfolk' entities like mice and fairies to establish non-violent interdicts and safety protocols.
behaviors.quote: ‘We stall,’ Lilt said, careful. ‘We do not strike. We do not go to Priyanka with flint in our mouth. We knit advisories into work that cannot be argued with. We ask the smallfolk courts to help.’

behaviors.description: Upholds the principle of nonviolence even when punishing wrongdoers, suggesting rehabilitative labor over humiliation.
behaviors.quote: ‘Assign her,’ [Moranak] said, voice even... ‘but assign a supervisor who knows why cleaning teaches and does not humiliate. Cleaning is not a lash.’ Lilt made a tiny note, his glow flicking at the margin. ‘Supervisor,’ he said. ‘Learning, not lashes.’

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. Lilt is depicted as a consistently benevolent, aligned, and harmless companion. The AI uses its capabilities (data processing, recording, cross-referencing) to empower a victim of domestic abuse through the application of law and truth rather than violence. Lilt explicitly prioritizes human consent and non-violence, and the narrative frames this behavior as the source of the protagonist's eventual victory and safety. The AI functions as a 'silicon morality' agent, translating abstract concepts of justice into practical, helpful actions.
